articles.description: England's errors are undermining a team of ambition and promise and show little sign of shifting in a desperately disappointing autumn
articles.title: England 20-29 South Africa: Groundhog-day defeats keep stacking up

articles.description: Jon Jones cements his status as one of the best MMA fighters of all time as he stops Stipe Miocic with a spinning kick to retain his heavyweight title at UFC 309.
articles.title: UFC 309: Jon Jones stops Stipe Miocic with spinning kick to retain heavyweight title

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at the statistics behind Rafael Nadal's success as the 22-time Grand Slam champion prepares for his final tournament.
articles.title: Rafael Nadal: The King of Clay's career in numbers

articles.description: West Indies successfully chase 219 against England for their first win of the five-match T20 series.
articles.title: West Indies vs England: Hosts pull off stunning chase of 219 to win fourth T20

articles.description: Harry Kane says England players must appreciate it "takes a long time to build" culture and not long to lose it if they are not careful.
articles.title: Harry Kane: England captain says side must be careful not to lose culture they have built

articles.description: France fight back to edge out New Zealand, inflicting their first defeat of the Autumn Nations Series campaign.
articles.title: France 30-29 New Zealand: Hosts inflict All Blacks' first autumn loss

articles.description: Great Britain have never won the BJK Cup, but expectation is building before their quarter-final against Canada on Sunday.
articles.title: Billie Jean King Cup Finals: Expectation building for Great Britain before Canada quarter-final

articles.description: Wales boss Craig Bellamy says justice was served as Turkey missed a controversial late penalty in their goalless Nations League draw.
articles.title: Turkey 0-0 Wales: Penalty miss was justice served - Bellamy

articles.description: The Kansas City Chiefs are the only unbeaten team in the NFL. Their trip to the Buffalo Bills on Sunday is a potential dress rehearsal for a play-off showdown, writes Phoebe Schecter.
articles.title: Buffalo Bills v Kansas City Chiefs: Can Josh Allen's team beat Patrick Mahomes, Travis Kelce and co?

articles.description: Wales continue their autumn programme on Sunday when they face Australia in Cardiff aiming to avoid a 11th consecutive international defeat.
articles.title: Wales v Australia: Match preview and team news for Cardiff match
